mainText:
Promo: "Bank of Entitlement - Where Your Every Whim Becomes Our Command!"

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: I once demanded a private jet to fly me to a fast-food drive-thru because I didn't feel like waiting in line. When the pilot refused, I dramatically declared that he was obstructing my basic human right to instant gratification! After a heated debate and a few tears (mostly his), he finally relented, and I soared through the golden arches in style. Who's the king of entitlement now? Thanks to the Bank of Entitlement, it's always me.
